weekly_plan.monday: Start the week with a light jog. Check out the new cafe in Adyar.
weekly_plan.tuesday: Catch the Leo trailer at 6 PM. Prepare for rain.
weekly_plan.wednesday: Watch India vs Afghan. Order pizza.
weekly_plan.friday: Movie night! Watch Mission Impossible on Prime.
weekly_plan.saturday: Attend the ARR Concert. Wear comfortable shoes.
weekly_plan.sunday: Relax at Besant Nagar beach morning. Family lunch.
